academicProjects.name: Genetic Algorithms: AI learns how to play Seper Mario Land
academicProjects.description: Super Mario World is a platform game that consist mainly on getting from point A to point B. The implementation of an AI agent to learn how to play this game incorporates Genetic Algorithms which are based on the ideas of natural selection and genetics. The goal of this project is that after N generations of size M, in generation N+1 and agent will be able to complete at least the first level of world 1. The tools needed are PyBoy, which is a GamBoy emulator developed in Python, and Python.
